comment._content: www.smithsonianmag.com/history-archaeology/pietown.html?c... Great article with the history of Pie Town inspired by these photographs.

comment.author: 87028509@N00
comment._content: amazing photos, I love seeing how people lived in different times.

comment.author: 8368860@N08
comment._content: Different they were, man we're panzies in this day and age.  Just look at us looking at them from the comfort of our carpeted homes and offices.  Makes me want to go live in a shack.  Or not; I like temperature control.
